name: Crossy Cars!
description:
Can you control the endless stream of traffic!?

Simply tap a car to stop it moving, and tap it again to send it on its way.

Stop and start cars to prevent horrible accidents! Or maybe just let the madness unfold!

Crossy Cars features:

- Addictive, one tap traffic-blocking gameplay
- Lots of fun levels to unlock and play
- Explore new areas of the city, each with their own new challenges
